column1: 2527,Audiologists and Speech Pathologists / Therapists,,"Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column5: Analyse patient data to determine patient needs or treatment goals
column7: Train patients, family members or caregivers in techniques for managing disabilities or illnesses
column11: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column13: Advise others on health care issues
column17: Develop health assessment methods or programs
column19: Administer health care or medical treatments
column21: Refer patients to other health care practitioners or health resources
column23: Operate diagnostic or therapeutic medical instruments or equipment
column27: Conduct research to increase knowledge about medical issues
